channel.title: Findings on UVA Data Science for the Public Good
channel.description: Recent content in Findings on UVA Data Science for the Public Good

item.title: General Overview of the Project
item.description:
Main Findings We set f1-score as the main indicator of the performance of our algorithms. For all 4 algorithms, we have obtained f1-scores above 90%, indicating the reliability of predictions. Accuracies obtained, further corroborate our confidence in the algorithms.
Figure 1: f1-scores of 4 algorithms used
Figure 2: Accuracies of 4 algorithms used
Conclusion and Policy Implications Given the f1-scores and accuracies above, the project has the potential to create tangible benefit to the municipality.

item.title: Results Section One
item.description: {css, echo=FALSE} /* this chunnk of code centers all of the headings */ h1, h2, h3 { text-align: center; } Examples Page If you want to add in an image on an Rmd file, use this link here. It ends up being a little tricky, but as long as you have created a folder to insert your images, you can just use some markdown code or html to insert images in the format you want.

item.title: Results Section Two
item.description: [Here you will describe the data discoversy process, the data used, and the methods employed for this single page. Since you already have a Project Overview and Data & Methods tabs, you probably want to keep this first paragraph fairly short and use the rest of the document to walk your readers through your analyses.] Main Findings [Here you will describe the results and include important visualizations from your project.
